Name: Andra Resting Post Postcard
Description: Erected after the war beside the historic Andra Basin battlefield, this resting post now shelters 'battlefield scavengers'—solitary figures who search for remnants of gear left behind from the Asterleeds Independence War...
Description$english: Erected after the war beside the historic Andra Basin battlefield, this resting post now shelters 'battlefield scavengers'—solitary figures who search for remnants of gear left behind from the Asterleeds Independence War...
Description2$english: Obtaining this item will unlock the corresponding postcard, which can be viewed in the "Archive."
